post_title: FS: T206 Hal Chase w/tTophy Piedmont Factory 42 Back
post_content:
Rare Piedmont 42 back.  $3300 delivered, PP/FF, Zelle, CashApp, etc. PM if interested.


[url=https://flic.kr/p/2oN8e4V][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53030509999_f85ae7f639_z.jpg[/img][/url]
One of the toughest PD 42 backs. This is a great card !!
